activityData.activityTitle: Cannot Connect to a Wireless Network Scenario
activityData.activitySubtitle: Cannot Conncect to a Wireless Network Subtitle
activityData.scenario: An Xbox 360S is connected to a Router with a wireless connection. The customer calls because they cannot connect to Xbox LIVE.
activityData.completion: The customer can now connect to Xbox LIVE.

feedback.incorrect: Generic first incorrect feedback.
Generic second incorrect feedback.
Generic third incorrect feedback.

step.description: Run Connection Test by selecting the Xbox wireless controller.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Run Connection Test by selecting the Xbox wireless controller. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Xbox wireless controller to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Press the Guide button on your controller.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. The Guide button is the large button located between the "back" and "start" button. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Guide to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Settings. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Settings to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select System Settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select System Settings. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select System Settings to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Network Settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Network Settings. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Network Settings to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the Wireless network connection.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Wireless Network. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Wireless Network to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the Xbox Wireless network connection.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Xbox Wireless Network. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Xbox Wireless Network to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Test Xbox LIVE Connection.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Test Xbox LIVE Connection. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Test Xbox LIVE Connection to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select More Info.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select More Info. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select More Info to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Configure Network.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Configure Network. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Configure Network to proceed to the next step.

step.description: The wireless network adapter is working as multiple wireless networks are available.
Select the Modem or Router to restart network equipment.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the Modem or Router to restart network equipment. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Modem or Router to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Power off the console.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the console power button to turn off the console. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the console power button to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the router power adapter to turn off the router.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the router power adapter to turn off the router. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the router power adapter to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the modem power adapter to turn off the modem.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the modem power adapter to turn off the modem. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the modem power adapter to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Wait for 30 seconds before turning on the modem.
Select the power adapter of the appropriate network equipment to turn it on.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the power adapter of the modem to turn it on. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the power adapter of the modem to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Power on the router.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the router power adapter to turn on the router. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the router power adapter to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Power on the console.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the console power button to turn on the console. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the console power button to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Restore to Factory Defaults by selecting the Xbox wireless controller.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Restore to factory defaults by selecting the Xbox wireless controller. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Xbox wireless controller to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the ‘Xbox’ Wireless Network.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the ‘Xbox’ Wireless Network. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the ‘Xbox’ Wireless Network to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Configure Network.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Configure Network. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Configure Network to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the Additional Settings tab.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the Additional Settings tab. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Additional Settings tab to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Restore to Factory Defaults.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Restore to Factory Defaults.
That is still incorrect. Select Restore to Factory Defaults to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the Back button to return to Network Settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the Back button. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Back button to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the Back button to return to Available Networks.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the Back button. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Back button to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select your ‘Xbox’ Wireless network.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select ‘Xbox’ wireless network. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select ‘Xbox’ Wireless Network to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Enter ‘xbox1’ to and select 'Done' to connect.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Enter 'xbox1' to connect.
That is still incorrect. Enter 'xbox1' to connect and to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Retry to acquire password from PC and enter in the Wireless Network Settings.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Retry. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Retry to proceed to the next step.

step.description: The Password did not work. The Customer has PC running Windows 7. Select the PC to acquire Wireless adapter password.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the PC to acquire Wireless adapter password. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the PC to proceed to the next step.

task.completion: Make note of the SSID and Password (7gcgMHKZ) to Configure Wireless Network. Select this window to continue.

step.description: Select the wireless strength indicator on the Windows 7 taskbar (bottom right corner).

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Click the wireless strength indicator on the Windows 7 taskbar. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Click the wireless strength indicator to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select your wireless network name.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select your wireless network name. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select your wireless network name to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Properties.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Properties. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Properties to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select Show Characters to display the wireless network password.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select Show Characters to display the wireless network password. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select Show Characters to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Select the Xbox 360S to enter the password.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Select the Xbox 360S to to enter the password. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Select the Xbox 360S to proceed to the next step.

step.description: Enter the wireless network password acquired previously and select Done when you are finished.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Try again.
Incorrect. Enter the wireless network password and select Done. Try again.
That is still incorrect. Enter the wireless network password (7gcgMHKZ) and select Done to proceed to the next step.
